label: LaboratoryObservationContact
comment: A person or department that acts as a point of contact for laboratory observations.

datatypeProperties.comment: The name, expressed as text, of a department for this trade address.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
The name, expressed as text, of the person for this laboratory observation contact.

referencedBy.comment: The person defined as the contact for this laboratory observation party.
